Package entities

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
entities.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
Represents a Suggestion Object A Suggestion has the base attributres of a campId, rationale, suggestionAspect (the CampAspect to alter @see CampAspect), accepted (whether the suggestion has been accepted by the camp committee), creationDate and lastUpdatedDate Each suggestions has a unique suggestionId which is an auto-incremented static attribute
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    accepted
    accepted is whether the suggestion has been accepted if accepted, the suggestion cannot be edited
    private final LocalDate
    creationDate
    creationDate is the date that the suggestion was created
    private LocalDate
    lastUpdatedDate
    lastUpdateDate is the date that the suggestion was last updated
    private static int
    nextSuggestionId
    nextSuggestionId ensures uniqueness of next suggestion as it gets added
    private String
    rationale
    rationale is the reason for the suggestion
    private Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object>
    suggestionAspect
    suggestionAspect is the aspect of the camp that the suggestion is for
    private final int
    suggestionId
    suggestionId is the unique id of the suggestion

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(int suggestionId, String rationale, Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> suggestionAspect, boolean accepted, LocalDate creationDate, LocalDate lastUpdatedDate)
      Constructor for Suggestion when reading from the suggestion_list.csv Overloaded to include lastUpdateDate
      Parameters:
      suggestionId - the suggestionId to be assigned to the new suggestion
      rationale - the reason for the suggestion
      suggestionAspect - the aspect of the camp that the suggestion is for
      accepted - whether the suggestion has been accepted
      creationDate - the date that the suggestion was created
      lastUpdatedDate - the date that the suggestion was last updated

  • Method Details

    • setNextSuggestionId

      public static void setNextSuggestionId(int nextSuggestionId)
      When reading from the suggestions.csv, the suggestionId is already included get the next suggestionId from the csv file this ensures that the next suggestionId is always greater than the previous and previous suggestionId will not be overwritten
      Parameters:
      nextSuggestionId - the next suggestionId to be assigned to a new suggestion

    • getSuggestionId

      public int getSuggestionId()
      Get the suggestionId of this suggestion
      Returns:
      the suggestionId of this suggestion

    • getSuggestionAspect

      public Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> getSuggestionAspect()
      Get the suggestionAspect of this suggestion. Each suggestion corresponds only to one aspect of the camp
      Returns:
      the suggestionAspect of this suggestion

    • setSuggestionAspect

      public boolean setSuggestionAspect(Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> newSuggestionAspect)
      Set the suggestionAspect of this suggestion. Each suggestion corresponds only to one aspect of the camp
      Parameters:
      newSuggestionAspect - the new suggestionAspect to be set
      Returns:
      true if suggestionAspect is successfully set, false otherwise
